message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point for us.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation
Bob, this is a better deal for you than the next round will be with inflation. Let's be realistic and close this deal.
Inflation is hitting me harder, I need a better deal to make up for it
Bob, it's clear we both want a good deal. This offer reflects the changing value and gets us both something. Let's end this here.
